name: Warmth
description:
You touch a creature or an object. For the duration, the target has an internal temperature perceived as comfortable by either the target if it is sentient, or by you if the target is a non-sentient object. The target also gains resistance against cold damage for 2 rounds.
 
The duration of comfortable warmth extends by an hour when you reach 5th level, 11th level, and 17th level.
